title: AT&T UniStream Universal Bluetooth Docking Station (BD01)
features: Integrated Bluetooth 2.1(A2DP) technology, Wirelessly stream Audio from any device.
Universal stand to accommodate most smartphones and tablets
description: UniStream from AT&T is a truly versatile universal docking station for smartphones and tablets. Pair your Bluetooth device directly with UniStream for high quality sound over A2DP and wireless freedom. The universal dock also offers a standard audio input so you can plug in non-Bluetooth devices as well with the included audio cable. Unistream's sound system is second to none, offering amazing power and truly balanced sound for all genres. And with the push of button you can enhance the bass response of your audio. With the integrated USB port at the back, you can charge most devices including iPhone, iPod, Android and Blackberry smartphones. The smart cable management system allows you run your USB cables under the docking station and out of your way, keeping your desk cable and clutter free. UniStream is compatible with Android and iPad/iPhone/iPod devices, giving you the flexibility to use it with many different devices. If your looking for freedom, quality & flexibility in a docking station, UniStream is a perfect choice.
